channel.title: Uuid on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Uuid on Blog

item.title: VMware UUIDs
item.description: Hi everybody! My first post is about UUIDs – identifiers used for virtual machines in vSphere infrastructure. If you ever looked in vm config file (*.vmx) you could see 3 different lines containing 128-bit hex numbers. They are: uuid.bios uuid.location vc.uuid Because of having some issues with software licensing inside guest OS I decided to explore what the every value is responsible for. Web hasn’t gave me the complete answer about the meaning of all of these parameters so my investigations led me to the following conclusion I’d like to share with you.
